Two servers reused a prime when generating their RSA keys. Can you decrypt the intercepted message? Here is the ciphertext: ciphertext1: 5072595415791173971271020814223567194045007187870023619893544808255450662098390046819832236124023541061744916510758708089097188574239249725782667673186550, ciphertext2: 2033931836321886865790112664127755093343215809992854199056911111138040088796468552999064407365743938018284311265893888478328224422174695576346716798150222

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=9830490265012860389414870976440342124863051662631197805182012163113879697301784122532740460253409722103842455810362072845369289392902645886091416564927539, n2=6460781334380863660570108305176215552275356596208965117779750961777016776129406899410175645657735123715390098532800955923333977065842650243578937622943221, e=42636012344976199345431457028870205558944571855470304623715525878614915947561522454173261551638147210146093554896633737511281568045918059647478531580757

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{ukza4gmk}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 5072595415791173971271020814223567194045007187870023619893544808255450662098390046819832236124023541061744916510758708089097188574239249725782667673186550, ciphertext2: 2033931836321886865790112664127755093343215809992854199056911111138040088796468552999064407365743938018284311265893888478328224422174695576346716798150222
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=9830490265012860389414870976440342124863051662631197805182012163113879697301784122532740460253409722103842455810362072845369289392902645886091416564927539, n2=6460781334380863660570108305176215552275356596208965117779750961777016776129406899410175645657735123715390098532800955923333977065842650243578937622943221, e=42636012344976199345431457028870205558944571855470304623715525878614915947561522454173261551638147210146093554896633737511281568045918059647478531580757
extra_info: p=105838043563416298112547779836085932662305611781489882279138211499482748679389, q=92882388355209940743806747773231007887629392645801380643652816283606415158351, r=69558733886912015207725591274777075299355874638862159774437829549419083445371, φ(n1)=9830490265012860389414870976440342124863051662631197805182012163113879697301585402100821834014553367576233138869812137840941998129979854858308327401089800, φ(n2)=6460781334380863660570108305176215552275356596208965117779750961777016776129244458287933523701783591376342090449613970656049313525424559597745912124339500
